entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
